inclusion.criterion: enrolled in school or homebound instruction in a grade Kindergarten through 12th
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A diagnosis of leukemia, lymphoma, or brain tumor (e.g., primary brain tumors, leptomeningeal infiltration, or metastases) that requires treatment of the CNS (surgery, CRT, and/or chemotherapy)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Within 2 months to 14 months after beginning treatment for cancer
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: English-speaking (This is defined as the ability to appropriately respond to test and training materials.)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A major physical, neurologic, or psychiatric condition that would preclude participation comprehend training materials and therapeutic interventions.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: obese woman with no acute distress
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of hypercholesterolemia, NVDs, and is mildly febrile. She has several gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones.
